about_the_game:
In the year 2079, the United States crumbled under the weight of climate catastrophe, resource wars, and political collapse. Once a beacon of prosperity, it has now become a desolate wasteland where survival is the only law. The remnants of humanity form factions, each vying for dominance over what little remains—water, power, food, and fuel. Amidst this chaos, whispers speak of a hidden paradise, a land untouched by ruin known only as Elysium. Many believe it to be a myth, while others would kill for even the slightest clue to its location.

Survival Mechanics

  • Players must manage hunger, thirst, and stamina while scavenging for resources.

  • Build and upgrade shelters, craft weapons, and forge alliances or rivalries with other survivors.

Factions and Politics

  • Players can choose to ally with a faction for protection, trade, and resources—or remain independent, risking the wrath of all.

  • Dynamic relationships with factions based on player actions, such as sabotage, diplomacy, or infiltration.

Exploration and Combat

  • Explore abandoned cities, hidden bunkers, and underground facilities to uncover valuable loot and clues about Elysium.

  • Face off against raiders, mutated wildlife, and rival players (in multiplayer mode).

Clues to Elysium

  • Scattered across the wasteland are cryptic journals, maps, and old broadcasts hinting at the location of Elysium.

  • Players must decipher these clues while avoiding the attention of factions and others searching for the fabled paradise.

Dynamic Weather and Day/Night Cycle

  • Sandstorms, acid rain, and blizzards challenge players as they traverse the wasteland.

Faction Warfare

  • AI-controlled factions expand their territories, leading to skirmishes and large-scale battles that players can influence.

Base Building

  • Players can establish and fortify a personal base or align with faction strongholds to gain resources and protection.

Multiplayer Options

  • Cooperative or competitive multiplayer modes where players can band together or betray each other for control of resources.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game features violent interactions and dismemberment of limbs during combat. This is both in relation to wildlife and infected NPCs. 

Certain infected NPCs were designed topless revealing their breasts.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD FX-9590 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB or AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
